content: That fixed it for me, thanks! The readme on https://github.com/rust-lang/rust has a list of dependencies for Unix system, maybe that could be updated to include libstdc++-static?
Raekye has marked this topic as resolved.
@Raekye probably unrelated to your issue, but updating the submodules yourself is unnecessary, x.py avoids cloning them unless it needs to
If you could open an issue for this behavior that would be great - bootstrap should give a better error message instead of generating invalid arguments
